user.description: Configure your home project ledger settings and choose where to store receipt images.

credentials_needed.title: Application Credentials Required
credentials_needed.description:
To use {provider}, you need to add application credentials first.

1. Go to **Settings → Devices & Services → Application Credentials**
2. Click **Add Application Credentials**
3. Select **Home Project Ledger**
4. Enter your OAuth credentials from the provider's developer console
5. Come back here and try again

application_credentials.description:
Enter OAuth credentials for cloud storage providers. You'll need to create an application in the respective developer console:

- **Google Drive**: [Google Cloud Console](https://console.cloud.google.com/)
- **Dropbox**: [Dropbox App Console](https://www.dropbox.com/developers/apps)
- **OneDrive**: [Azure Portal](https://portal.azure.com/)
